title: Announcement, Directions, 1987
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center, left: DESIGN: EDW FELLA
inscribed:
Recto: Center, radiatng from oval shape: RAFAEL A DURAN/ ROBERT DOLSEN/... [lists participating artists]...JERI HOLLISTER; diagonally across center, right, running downward: DIRECTIONS, 1987- JUROR: ARTIST / WILLIAM WEEGE; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; diagonally across lower third of sheet, running upward: MAY 29-JUNE 27 OPENING RECEPTION: FRIDAY, MAY 29, 6:00-8:00 PM GALLERY CLOSED JUNE 19-20; 
Verso: Center, enclosed by circular shape: MAY 29- JUNE 27/ DIRECTIONS, 1987-; across lower left quadrant, enclosed by triangular shape: Detroit Focus/ GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226; enclosed by irregular shape, running downward, sideways: Detroit Council of the Arts/ With the support of the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts; across lower right quadrant, enclosed by irregular shape: Non-profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, MI/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Upper right quadrant, geometric shapes, embellishments.  Center, text giving participating artists forms oval shape, each time radiating from center; Center, left two lines meet at point.  Center, right, text giving title, dates, juror with various geometric shapes.  Across lower left edge, text giving location, contact information.  Diagonally across lower third of sheet, text giving dates, reception, and additional information.   
Verso: Upper right quadrant, abstract geometric shape.  Center, circular shape enclosing text giving exhibition title, dates.  Across lower third of sheet, enclosed in abstract geometric shapes, text giving sponsors, mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Directions, 1987. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-33
